books.title: The Name of the Wind
books.author: Patrick Rothfuss
books.description: Also called The Kingkiller Chronicle: Day One, is a fantasy novel written by American author Patrick Rothfuss. It is the first book in a series called The Kingkiller Chronicle and followed by The Wise Man's Fear.

books.title: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
books.author: J.K. Rowling
books.description: A global phenomenon and cornerstone of contemporary children’s literature, J.K. Rowling’s Harry Potter series is both universally adored and critically acclaimed. Now, experience the magic as you’ve never heard it before.
